subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In a game they wished they had played last October, the Mets sent out most of the same players who would have started Game 1 of the World Series while Detroit left most of its veterans back home.
snippet: In a game they wished they had played last October, the Mets sent out most of the same players who would have started Game 1 of the World Series while Detroit left most of its veterans back home.
